text: Degree commonly stands for someone who theorizes (especially in science or art).
Burn commonly stands for a browning of the skin resulting from exposure to the rays of the sun.
A string of words satisfying the grammatical rules of a language is never an appropriate definition of split.
Authority is not an appropriate hypernym of adviser in any context.
Range does never refer to a large tract of grassy open land on which livestock can graze.
No presence may be a positive motivational influence.
A harmony is never compatibility in opinion and action.
Not a single note may be a comment or instruction (usually added).
Flight may not stand for a stairway (set of steps) between one floor or landing and the next.
A network may be a cessation of normal operation.
A biography is classified as a history.
In certain contexts a hospitality is classified as a welcome.
Dependence may not stand for being abnormally tolerant to and dependent on something that is psychologically or physically habit-forming (especially alcohol or narcotic drugs).
In certain contexts a person who is a member of a partnership may be an appropriate definition of partner.
In certain contexts the branch of physics that deals with the emission and effects of electrons and with the use of electronic devices may be an appropriate definition of electronics.
In no context a prosperity may be a type of country.
A contract between two or more persons who agree to pool talent and money and share profits or losses is an appropriate definition of partnership.
Justification stands for buying and selling.
Not a single slide may be vegetation that has grown.
A manner may be classified as a paper.
Notion may stand for a general inclusive concept.
No attraction may be the extent of something from side to side.
A crack may not be a person appointed to a high office in the government.
In certain contexts a single complete turn (axial or orbital) is an appropriate definition of drift.
In certain contexts the act of putting a liquid into the body by means of a syringe may be an appropriate definition of shot.
Quality or fidelity of a received broadcast is never an appropriate definition of housewife.
Fixture does not refer to any of various burrowing animals of the family Leporidae having long ears and short tails.
A ceiling may commonly be a stout length of sawn timber.
Not a single flight is the context and environment in which something is set.
Tower never stands for sloping land (especially the slope beside a body of water).
In no context equality between the totals of the credit and debit sides of an account is an appropriate definition of balance.
Mechanical system in a factory whereby an article is conveyed through sites at which successive operations are performed on it may be an appropriate definition of line in no context.
Vertical space available to allow easy passage under something may be an appropriate definition of clearance.
In no context the period of time during which you are absent from work or duty is an appropriate definition of galaxy.
Talk may not refer to deleting parts of publications or correspondence or theatrical performances.
Not a single hypothesis may be a first-year undergraduate.
A sign may be a clue in no context.
Bail may refer to the legal system that allows an accused person to be temporarily released from custody (usually on condition that a sum of money guarantees their appearance at trial).
Any celestial body visible (as a point of light) from the Earth at night is an appropriate definition of star in certain contexts.
Bridge does not stand for the heading or caption of a newspaper article.
Recognition by a college or university that a course of studies has been successfully completed may not be an appropriate definition of patient in any context.
A contribution is act of giving in common with others for a common purpose especially to a charity.
An exemption may be classified as a release.
A superiority in numbers or amount is never an appropriate definition of partner.
No glacier may commonly be a junction where one street or road crosses another.
No hay is grass mowed and cured for use as fodder.
A domestic fowl bred for flesh or eggs may be an appropriate definition of flight in no context.
Not a single excess may commonly be a line of people or vehicles waiting for something.
Brake refers to a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle.
Boot may commonly stand for footwear that covers the whole foot and lower leg.
Tract and parent are not always different.
In no context a person who rules or guides or inspires others is an appropriate definition of set.
A rhetoric is commonly close interaction.
In no context portions are part of boys.
A female member of a royal family other than the queen (especially the daughter of a sovereign) is not an appropriate definition of maze in any context.
Forest may stand for an army unit large enough to sustain combat.
The act of making or enacting laws may be an appropriate definition of legislation in no context.
No clerk may be a salesperson in a store.
A bullet is a projectile that is fired from a gun.
Place may not refer to a healthy state of wellbeing free from disease.
In certain contexts a substance that can be consumed to produce energy may be an appropriate definition of talk.
A selection may be the distance covered by a step.
Not a single transaction is commonly the act of transacting within or between groups (as carrying on commercial activities).
No withdrawal is a retraction of a previously held position.
Nationality may not refer to the status of belonging to a particular nation by birth or naturalization.
No remark may be explicit notice.
In no context wild and domesticated birds having a heavy body and short legs is an appropriate definition of series.
Impact does not stand for the striking of one body against another.
Fax may refer to duplicator that transmits the copy by wire or radio.
A musical organization consisting of a group of instrumentalists including string players is not an appropriate definition of age in any context.
Prayer does not stand for the act of communicating with a deity (especially as a petition or in adoration or contrition or thanksgiving).
In no context a correctional institution where persons are confined while on trial or for punishment is an appropriate definition of prison.
World commonly refers to being or relating to the smaller in number of two parts.
No game may commonly be a contest with rules to determine a winner.
No computing is commonly the smallest component of an element having the chemical properties of the element.
Delivery may not stand for the act of delivering a child.
A body serving in an administrative capacity is an appropriate definition of analyst in certain contexts.
An approximate calculation of quantity or degree or worth may not be an appropriate definition of line.
One of four equal parts may be an appropriate definition of cap in no context.
Not a single hand is commonly the (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb.
Ground may be an appropriate hypernym of forest in certain contexts.
Freckle refers to a disorderly outburst or tumult.
Blast commonly stands for young sheep.
The relative speed of progress or change is not an appropriate definition of rate.
A course of reasoning aimed at demonstrating a truth or falsehood may not be an appropriate definition of conglomerate.
Interaction never stands for cutlery used for serving and eating food.
A foot is part of a rhythm in no context.
A written proposal or reminder may not be an appropriate definition of distortion in any context.
Not a single password is commonly a secret word or phrase known only to a restricted group.
A curve may be part of a graph in no context.
A gravity is commonly a locally circumscribed place characterized by some distinctive features.
Assembly may commonly refer to the second nearest planet to the sun.
In no context a habit is a tradition.
Lemon may not refer to binary compound that occurs at room temperature as a clear colorless odorless tasteless liquid.
A statement that affirms or denies something and is either true or false is not an appropriate definition of spite.
The successful action of solving a problem is never an appropriate definition of solution in any context.
A voucher is a negotiable certificate that can be detached and redeemed as needed.
Sheet does not refer to paper used for writing or printing.
An amount of money expressed numerically is an appropriate definition of figure.
In no context a star-shaped character * used in printing is an appropriate definition of star.
In certain contexts equality between the totals of the credit and debit sides of an account may be an appropriate definition of balance.
An instance of questioning is an appropriate definition of foundation in no context.
Syndrome does never stand for a pattern of symptoms indicative of some disease.
In certain contexts something or someone that has suffered ruin or dilapidation is an appropriate definition of wreck.
A response is never a freedom.
Concept is not an appropriate hypernym of theory in any context.
The ability to comprehend is an appropriate definition of intelligence in no context.
The money risked on a gamble is an appropriate definition of stake.
A coast may commonly be the shore of a sea or ocean.
In no context a business especially one run on a large scale may be an appropriate definition of operation.
A quantity obtained by multiplication may be an appropriate definition of product in no context.
The state of having good sense and sound judgment is an appropriate definition of reason in certain contexts.
Examination may not refer to a plant where beer is brewed by fermentation.
Dividend does not refer to a periodical dedicated to a particular subject.
The protruding part of the lower jaw is an appropriate definition of doctor.
Not a single attention is commonly the faculty or power of mental concentration.
Heaven never stands for any place of complete bliss and delight and peace.
Adult and left may be always different.
A pop is never a sweet drink containing carbonated water and flavoring.
A ground may commonly be systematic investigation to establish facts.
Not a single flour may commonly be fine powdery foodstuff obtained by grinding and sifting the meal of a cereal grain.
A solid bounded by a cylindrical surface and two parallel planes (the bases) is not an appropriate definition of ring.
Tragedy is an appropriate hyponym of vessel in certain contexts.
Pity does not refer to the humane quality of understanding the suffering of others and wanting to do something about it.
Supply does never refer to questioning a statement and demanding an explanation.
Barrel may not be an appropriate hyponym of vessel in any context.
A silvery ductile metallic element found primarily in bauxite may be an appropriate definition of aluminium in certain contexts.
Adult may be an appropriate hypernym of host in no context.
Abbey commonly stands for a monastery ruled by an abbot.
In no context a scientist who devotes himself to doing research is an appropriate definition of researcher.
Hell does not refer to the line along which opposing armies face each other.
Character never refers to the trait of being uncommunicative.
Tactic commonly refers to a position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality.
Spell may not stand for a psychological state induced by (or as if induced by) a magical incantation.
In certain contexts a social class comprising those who do manual labor or work for wages is an appropriate definition of cycle.
In no context the obverse side of a coin that usually bears the representation of a person's head may be an appropriate definition of shield.
Not a single rehabilitation is the treatment of physical disabilities by massage and electrotherapy and exercises.
Monk is an appropriate hypernym of vector in certain contexts.
Strength is not the synonym of performance in any context.
Attack never stands for the trait of being uncommunicative.
Smell is an appropriate hyponym of patch in no context.
In no context a trainer may be a type of view.
No blow may commonly be the act of officially naming a candidate.
Not a single advance is an acknowledgment of appreciation.
Hole refers to an opening into or through something.
An enlarged and muscular saclike organ of the alimentary canal is an appropriate definition of size.
Lunch is an appropriate hyponym of set in certain contexts.
A right wing is those who support political or social or economic conservatism.
Not a single sequence is commonly serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.
Imagination is never an appropriate hypernym of vision.
